reviews.review_msg: It is true that she plays favorites, but anyone can get on her good side if you show you care about the subject.  Despite being a hard worker, she always finds time to answer questions.  One of the few professors who genuinely cares about her students.  She is also a great reference if youre planning to work in BC!

awesome awesome proff! I see no reason why anyone reasonable would get on her bad side. Probably one of my absolute favourites. Incredibly helpful, and wants to see you succeed. I was skeptical of the evaluation method in the beginning, but i'm converted, one of the best classes i've taken. Really effective lecturer too. wish i could take more!
